name: The Snowmen Vs The Sun: Remastered
name_original: The Snowmen Vs The Sun: Remastered
description:
This is a remaster of my old game The Snowmen Vs The Sun

Below is the list of updated features from the original game:

-  Added background imagery

- Added a settings menu where music and background imagery can be adjusted

- Lowered the score amount needed to unlock new skins

- Added 

The score will reset every time you exit.

Controls: Arrow keys to move around the screen, Space to jump, down button to slide

Music by Rhys Williams

Have Fun!
